name: Soft Body
description: Soft Body is a meditative action game where you control two beautiful, gooey snakes at the same time. In the game, you paint the world with your body, and as you do so, the world changes around you and reveals new obstacles and challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 6 years DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Soft Body is an amazing game. Sound and graphics blend so well together and create something very special along with the gameplay. Highly recommended!

What right does this game have to call itself 'meditative?' I certainly don't feel relaxed. I feel like my mind is strangling itself with a wire. The learning curve is not so much steep as it is endless. I have been playing for only about three hours and I feel like a two-year-old desperately fighting against his own undeveloped motor skills. My thumbs hurt. My hands hurt.  Anyway, you should buy this game.
